MS MCQs

    Microsoft Cloud App Security SIEM integration

    »

    1. What level of logs and alerts can Microsoft Cloud App Security send to Azure Sentinel?

      Microsoft Cloud App Security can send all logs and alerts to Azure Sentinel.

      Critical logs and alerts.

      No logs or alerts.


    2. How does Azure Sentinel gather additional information about an alert?

      Azure Sentinel playbooks can call APIs to gather additional information about an alert.

      Azure Sentinel Playbooks are automatically fed high priority alert data.

      Alerts create log files that Azure Sentinel can read.


    3. How does Azure Sentinel automate the triage of infrequent country requests?

      Azure Active Directory automatically triggers Azure Sentinel when infrequent country requests occur and provides all user information to Azure Sentinel.

      Azure Sentinel is triggered by Microsoft Cloud App Security and makes API calls to gather additional information.

      Microsoft Cloud App Security is triggered by Azure Sentinel and makes API calls to gather additional information.


    4. What operating system can the syslog server run to connect Microsoft Cloud App Security to a 3rd party SIEM solution?

      Windows only.

      Linux only.

      Windows or Linux.
